entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
